程序包 us.codecraft.webmagic

类 Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.Page

  • public class Page
extends Object
    Object storing extracted result and urls to fetch.
    Not thread safe.
    Main method：
    getUrl() get url of current page
    getHtml() get content of current page
    putField(String, Object) save extracted result
    getResultItems() get extract results to be used in Pipeline
    addTargetRequests(java.util.List) addTargetRequest(String) add urls to fetch
    从以下版本开始:
    0.1.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com
    另请参阅:
    Downloader, PageProcessor
